title: SCRUM MCP Control Room - World Class Dashboard Upgrade
description: Transform the Control Room dashboard from 7.5/10 to 9+/10 - matching Linear/Vercel quality standards

stories.title: Fix Visual Consistency - Button & Card Styling
stories.description: Fix the Button component to use amber/stone theme instead of cyan. Standardize card padding to p-6 across all dashboard cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Button component uses amber-500/amber-600 colors instead of cyan
All card components use consistent p-6 padding
Hover states use amber glow effect
Button variants: default (amber), secondary (stone), destructive (red)

stories.title: Add Toast Notification System
stories.description: Add a toast notification system using sonner for error handling, success messages, and real-time event notifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Install and configure sonner toast library
Add Toaster component to App.tsx
Replace console.error calls in useScrumStore with toast.error
Show toast on WebSocket connect/disconnect events
Toast styling matches dark amber theme

stories.title: Implement Cmd+K Command Palette Search
stories.description: Add a Linear-style Cmd+K command palette with keyboard navigation, filters, and recent searches.
acceptanceCriteria: Cmd+K (Mac) / Ctrl+K (Win) opens search modal
Modal has dark glassmorphic overlay effect
Search filters: type:task, status:in_progress, agent:claude
Arrow key navigation through results
Enter selects result, Escape closes
Shows recent searches when empty
Debounced search input (300ms)

stories.title: Enhanced Task Queue with Sorting & Filtering
stories.description: Upgrade TaskQueue to a proper data table with sorting, filtering, and better visual hierarchy.
acceptanceCriteria: Sort dropdown: by priority (default), created date, status, title
Filter chips for status (todo, in_progress, done, blocked)
Sortable column headers with direction indicators
Improved row hover states with subtle highlight
Task count badge in header
Empty state with helpful message

stories.title: Implement LobbyFeed Activity Stream
stories.description: Create the missing LobbyFeed component as a real-time activity stream showing agent actions, task updates, and system events.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows chronological feed of events (newest first)
Event types: task created/updated, agent registered, claims, conflicts
Each event has icon, timestamp, description
Animated entry for new events
Max 50 events shown, auto-scroll to top on new
Filter by event type

stories.title: Agent Ops Panel - Quick Actions
stories.description: Implement AgentOpsPanel with quick actions for agent management and system controls.
acceptanceCriteria: Panel shows in sidebar or collapsible drawer
Quick actions: Refresh All, Clear Stale Claims, View Conflicts
Agent count by type (Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, Other)
System status indicators (API health, WS connection)
Action buttons with loading states
Collapsible sections for different action groups

stories.title: Enhanced Metrics Page with Burndown Chart
stories.description: Add a burndown chart and improve metrics visualizations with trend indicators and forecasting.
acceptanceCriteria: Add burndown chart component (sprint scope vs completed over time)
Trend indicators on all metric cards (up/down arrows with percentages)
Cycle time distribution histogram
Forecast line showing projected completion
Improved chart tooltips with detailed data
Date range selector for metrics (7d, 30d, custom)

stories.title: Loading States & Error Boundaries
stories.description: Add proper loading skeletons, error boundaries, and retry mechanisms throughout the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Skeleton loading components for cards, lists, charts
Error boundary wrapping main content areas
Fallback UI with retry button on errors
Loading state for initial data fetch
Graceful degradation when WebSocket disconnects
isLoading states in Zustand store

stories.title: Improved Task Detail Modal
stories.description: Enhance TaskDetailModal with full task information, edit capabilities, and better visual design.
acceptanceCriteria: Full-screen modal with backdrop blur
Task header with status badge, priority indicator
Description section with markdown rendering
Claims section showing current file claims
Activity timeline of task events
Keyboard shortcuts: Escape to close, Tab navigation
Smooth open/close animations

stories.title: Mobile Responsive Optimization
stories.description: Optimize the dashboard for mobile devices with responsive layouts and touch-friendly interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile navigation with hamburger menu
Metrics cards: 2 columns on tablet, 1 on mobile (not 4→1)
Touch-friendly tap targets (min 44px)
Swipe gestures for task cards
Collapsible sections for space efficiency
Bottom navigation bar on mobile

stories.title: Accessibility Improvements
stories.description: Add ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and focus indicators for WCAG AA compliance.
acceptanceCriteria: All interactive elements have ARIA labels
Focus visible indicators on all focusable elements
Skip to main content link
Proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
Color contrast meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for text)
Screen reader announcements for dynamic content

stories.title: Polish & Micro-interactions
stories.description: Add final polish with refined animations, hover effects, and visual details that make the dashboard feel premium.
acceptanceCriteria: Subtle page transitions between routes
Card hover lift effect with shadow
Status badge pulse animations
Smooth number counting animations for metrics
Gradient text effects on headers
Refined spacing and typography scale
Consistent border radius (8px standard, 12px cards)
